full_description:
Havit GC933 Gaming Chair

The Havit GC933 Gaming Chair is designed with a strong 1.2mm iron frame for durability and stability during long gaming sessions. To ensure comfort and support, the seat and backrest are constructed with original sponge, and the seat is molded sponge. This gaming chair, with its PVC leather upholstery, has a polished, businesslike appearance and is very low maintenance. In addition to linkage handrails for more convenience and adjustability, the Havit GC933 Gaming Chair has PU wheels for seamless mobility. Users can find the ideal position for gaming or relaxing thanks to the 130-degree range of motion provided by the angle adjuster and rear lever. It fits a variety of body types with its stage 3 gas rod. The 40cm wide by 50cm deep cushion of the Havit GC933 Gaming Chair offers plenty of room for comfortable seating. Additionally, the headrest, lumbar pillow, and wrapped backrest all follow the natural contours of the body to relieve pressure on the back and improve concentration while playing. The Havit GC933 Gaming Chair is designed with ergonomics and intelligent features to provide a quality gaming experience that is ideal for serious gamers.
